title: Metal Sunglass For Men - Black
description: Glass, also known as eyeglasses or spectacles, are devices consisting of glass or hard plastic lenses mounted in a frame that holds them in front of a person's eyes, typically using a bridge over the nose and arms which rest over the ears. Glasses are typically used for vision correction, such as with reading glasses and glasses used for nearsightedness. But Sunglasses are for the safeguard of our eyes from extreme rays and extra disturbing lights. Sunglasses can improve visual comfort and visual clarity by protecting the eye from glare.
